list.title: Dragon Ball Wiki statistics
list.content: There are currently 19,622,015 users registered with Dragon Ball Wiki, and as of today, there are 9,259 featured articles in the encyclopedia; every day, visitors from around the world make edits and create new articles to enhance the amount of knowledge held by the Dragon Ball Wiki encyclopedia...

list.title: Who writes Dragon Ball Wiki?
list.content: Regular editors can be everyone from expert scholars to casual readers, all with one thing in common: the general Dragon Ball Wiki user is a fan of the Dragon Ball franchise...
